titles.title: TEACH Act
TEACH Act
Tools to Educate All Children at Home Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to temporarily increase the deduction for certain expenses of elementary and secondary school teachers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Tools to Educate All Children at Home Act or the TEACH Act
This bill revises and temporarily increases the tax deduction for the expenses of elementary and secondary school teachers. Specifically, the deduction amount is increased from $250 to $1,000 in 2020 and 2021.
